# RailReach

> RailReach is a free interactive map showing train journey times from 350+ UK stations to 9 London main line terminals. Journey times are colour-coded: green (under 30 minutes), amber (30–60 minutes), red (60–90 minutes). All data is sourced from National Rail timetables (2026) and covers the fastest typical services, both direct and indirect, within 90 minutes of central London.

## Key Pages

- https://railreach.co.uk/ : Interactive commute map with journey times to all London terminals

## Terminal Pages

- https://railreach.co.uk/terminals/kings-cross/ : Kings Cross train times — 50+ stations via Great Northern, Thameslink, LNER
- https://railreach.co.uk/terminals/waterloo/ : Waterloo train times — 80+ stations via South Western Railway
- https://railreach.co.uk/terminals/paddington/ : Paddington train times — 35+ stations via GWR, Elizabeth Line
- https://railreach.co.uk/terminals/london-bridge/ : London Bridge train times — 45+ stations via Southeastern, Southern
- https://railreach.co.uk/terminals/victoria/ : Victoria train times — 50+ stations via Southeastern, Southern
- https://railreach.co.uk/terminals/liverpool-street/ : Liverpool Street train times — 35+ stations via Greater Anglia
- https://railreach.co.uk/terminals/euston/ : Euston train times — 18 stations via Avanti West Coast, London Northwestern
- https://railreach.co.uk/terminals/marylebone/ : Marylebone train times — 21 stations via Chiltern Railways
- https://railreach.co.uk/terminals/fenchurch-street/ : Fenchurch Street train times — 22 stations via c2c

## Popular Station Pages

- https://railreach.co.uk/stations/cambridge/ : Cambridge to London — 49 min to Kings Cross, 65 min to Liverpool Street
- https://railreach.co.uk/stations/reading/ : Reading to London — 23 min to Paddington
- https://railreach.co.uk/stations/oxford/ : Oxford to London — 45 min to Paddington
- https://railreach.co.uk/stations/brighton/ : Brighton to London — 58 min to Victoria, 60 min to London Bridge
- https://railreach.co.uk/stations/guildford/ : Guildford to London — 33 min to Waterloo
- https://railreach.co.uk/stations/woking/ : Woking to London — 23 min to Waterloo
- https://railreach.co.uk/stations/st-albans/ : St Albans to London — 20 min to Kings Cross
- https://railreach.co.uk/stations/stevenage/ : Stevenage to London — 20 min to Kings Cross
- https://railreach.co.uk/stations/milton-keynes/ : Milton Keynes to London — 30 min to Euston
- https://railreach.co.uk/stations/chelmsford/ : Chelmsford to London — 30 min to Liverpool Street
- https://railreach.co.uk/stations/sevenoaks/ : Sevenoaks to London — 23 min to London Bridge, 30 min to Victoria
- https://railreach.co.uk/stations/basingstoke/ : Basingstoke to London — 44 min to Waterloo
- https://railreach.co.uk/stations/winchester/ : Winchester to London — 59 min to Waterloo
- https://railreach.co.uk/stations/watford/ : Watford to London — 16 min to Euston
- https://railreach.co.uk/stations/swindon/ : Swindon to London — 50 min to Paddington
- https://railreach.co.uk/stations/colchester/ : Colchester to London — 45 min to Liverpool Street
- https://railreach.co.uk/stations/ipswich/ : Ipswich to London — 56 min to Liverpool Street
- https://railreach.co.uk/stations/peterborough/ : Peterborough to London — 44 min to Kings Cross
- https://railreach.co.uk/stations/bedford/ : Bedford to London — 39 min to Kings Cross
- https://railreach.co.uk/stations/high-wycombe/ : High Wycombe to London — 27 min to Marylebone
- https://railreach.co.uk/stations/tonbridge/ : Tonbridge to London — 36 min to London Bridge, 40 min to Victoria
- https://railreach.co.uk/stations/tunbridge-wells/ : Tunbridge Wells to London — 47 min to London Bridge
- https://railreach.co.uk/stations/crawley/ : Crawley to London — 38 min to Victoria
- https://railreach.co.uk/stations/bromley-south/ : Bromley South to London — 18 min to Victoria
- https://railreach.co.uk/stations/richmond/ : Richmond to London — 18 min to Waterloo
- https://railreach.co.uk/stations/slough/ : Slough to London — 15 min to Paddington
- https://railreach.co.uk/stations/maidenhead/ : Maidenhead to London — 19 min to Paddington

## Data Summary

- 350+ stations across all major routes and branch lines
- 9 London terminals
- Journey times represent fastest typical services from 2026 timetables
- Covers both direct trains and services requiring one change
- Maximum journey time: 90 minutes
- Colour coding: green (<30 min), amber (30–60 min), red (60–90 min)

## Contact

- Website: https://railreach.co.uk
